body.name: LeadsaiL Wireless Mouse for Laptop, 2.4GHz Silent USB Mouse, Slim Optical Mouse with 3 Buttons, 1600 DPI, Works with Windows, Mac, Chrome OS, Linux
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 7 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard products are made with at least 50% recycled content and meet social, environmental, and chemical requirements.

features: 【Silent Click Noiseless Mouse】Would you like to do your job without missing a sound or disturbing your environment? Choose LeadsaiL quiet mice; you will enjoy the same click feeling with over 90% less click noise.

【High Precision LED Mouse】Would like to take full control of your every aim with perfect tracking? Choose LeadsaiL optical LED wireless mouse. Featuring a 1600 DPI, the laser-grade engine ensures smooth cursor control and precision tracking on virtually any surface.

【Plug and Play Travel Mouse】Plug and go ready along with the Nano Receiver stored in the battery compartment, LeadsaiL USB wireless travel mouse works with Windows, Mac, Chrome OS or Linux-based computers of Notebook, PC, Laptop, Computer, Macbook.
【Portable Slim Mini Mouse】The slim mini mouse adopts shapely, domed design for giving your palm plenty of support and seamlessly fits in your hand, so you can work or play comfortably for long hours.

【Energy Saving Mobile Mouse】LeadsaiL mobile mouse keeps going with months battery life of power on a single AA battery(Not included in the package). Automatic sleep mode and an On/Off switch save power, (Battery life may vary based on use and computing conditions.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LeadsaiL Multicolor 2.4G Wireless Mouse-More Colors, More Joy, Fit More. 2.4G Advanced Wireless Connectivity Technology--No More Cord Tangled, Portable and Convenient to Any Places, Just Plug and Play.Slient Click Button: Reducing 90% of the Click Noise--Less Nosise while More Focused.No Lag or Delay: Plug the USB Receiver to the Port, You Will Enjoy a Wireless Range of 10M(33fts)

Smart Energy Saving: Three stages of sleeping mode, out of use for 3 seconds/70s/15mins, the mouse will trun into different sleeping mode to save the energy comsumption so that to extend the AA battery life(click any key, you will be able to wake the mouse up). An ON/OFF switch will allow you to turn it off whenever you want.Ergonomic Design: The slim mini mouse adopts shapely, domed design for giving your palm plenty of support and seamlessly fits in your hand, so you can work or play comfortably for long hours.Compact and Light Weight: Featuring the size of 11*6*4cm, the usb mouse is portable and easy to carry with you to any occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight and accurate
reviews.reviewText: comfortable and easy to set up and use, this mouse is lightweight and a perfect size for smaller hands. it performs well and accurately and i love having a right click (as opposed to an apple mouse). i’m not sure it’s the most durable because it is so lightweight, but i am also not doing any kind of rigorous use like gaming. super comfortable and cute on my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars That it works well.
reviews.reviewText: I've had my other mouse for a few years, but it had given up. So I decided to get a new one from Amazon instead of buying it from the same retailer as my computer. The price was better at Amazon but the quality better, as well. I'm very pleased with it's performance and expect many years from this product. It also looks lovely and you can pick different colors. I chose blue; my other one was red. I can say that the product and color was true to its description and design. I truly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and worth it
reviews.reviewText: SOO CUTE totally fits in my palm, definitely a must if you have smaller hands and don’t want a big mouse. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Has a slight sound
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse, it's cheap, cute, and works just fine. I don't have much of a complaint but it's not completely silent. I had a mouse that was noiseless before this one, and it had 0 sound. This one doesn't have that loud clicking, but it's a very subtle clicking sound that comes out. Once again, it isn't loud, just a very tiny click noise. I still recommend this, 100%!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mouse since I couldn’t find the original one that I had purchased years ago haha which was very similar to this one anywho I have now been using this mouse for about 8 months. Very lightweight, easy to set up as well, the battery lasts a long time I would say about 3 months since it is powered by batteries. A word of advice is to always keep extra batteries in hand because the only thing I don’t like is that it does not tell you when the battery is low simply the mouse just stops working and that’s the key for the battery to be changed. I purchased the sky blue color it’s very nice!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the mouse. It is comfortable on my hang.
reviews.reviewText: I use the mouse with my laptop. I love this mouse. Most of the time I do not use the mouse pad. I place it on my laptop and use it. It works very well and I love the color. It is the most comfortable mouse I ever used on the computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As the product says, the mouse clicks are super quiet. It glides smoothly and the sides are made of plastic instead of rubber so that you won't have that ugly yellowing (like my last mouse did). Love the colors and it's the perfect fit for my hands!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use, I am going to buy a spare just for peace of mind.
reviews.reviewText: I love that you can use this product without being bothered by wires getting in your way all of the time, just plug it it and it works in conjunction with your mouse. Easy to travel with, fits easily in a jacket pocket or your laptop case !
